name: Fenix HP15 Ultimate Edt. Expedition Headlamp
description: For alpine starts, ultra-running or climbing late into the night, the HP15 provides enormous illumination in a lightweight package. Using standard AA batteries, this headlamp is a solid choice for extended treks where the chance to recharge your lamp isn't readily available. 6 lighting modes range from around-camp mellow to the mega 960-lumens boost that casts a bright beam for up to 30 seconds. Simple, durable, and extremely bright, the HP15 is an excellent choice for serious missions requiring big light.Durable alloy and plastic construction for long term reliability.Cree XM-L2 LED has a lifespan of 50,000 hours.6 output modes: 10, 50, 150, 400, and boost.Uses 4 AA batteries.Run time ranges from 160 hours (in 10 lumens Eco mode) to 3.5 hours (at 400 lumens).900+ lumens boost mode provides 178m of illumination for approximately 30 seconds.Lockout cover prevents accidental activation.60-degree tilt.
